mapper.insert: insert into city (id, cityName, cityCode, createTime, updateTime, locationId, acronym) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acronym,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update city set cityName = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityCode = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locationId = #{locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acronym = #{acronym,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, cityName, cityCode, createTime, updateTime, locationId, acronym from city
